languages.text: "Хорошо еще что получилось поймать ее по горячим следам — если бы змея уползла, твоя семья, старик, могла бы получить ой какой неприятный сюрприз лет эдак через пять или десять..."
"It's a good thing we caught her in the act — if the snake had got away, your family could have been in for a nasty surprise in about five or ten years' time, old man..."
languages.original_text: "Хорошо еще что получилось поймать ее по горячим следам — если бы змея уползла, твоя семья, старик, могла бы получить ой какой неприятный сюрприз лет эдак через пять или десять..."

traits.locale_text: "It's a good thing we caught her in the act — if the snake had got away, your family could have been in for a nasty surprise in about five or ten years' time, old man..."
"It's a good thing we caught her in the act — if the snake had got away, your family could have been in for a nasty surprise in about five or ten years' time, old man..."
"It's a good thing we caught her in the act — if the snake had got away, your family could have been in for a nasty surprise in about five or ten years' time, old man..."
"It's a good thing we caught her in the act — if the snake had got away, your family could have been in for a nasty surprise in about five or ten years' time, old man..."

languages.text: “幸好我们当场抓住了她。如果那条毒蛇逃掉的话，再过个五年，或者十年，你的家人恐怕又要迎接一场可怕的惊喜了，老家伙……”
languages.original_text: "It's a good thing we caught her in the act — if the snake had got away, your family could have been in for a nasty surprise in about five or ten years' time, old man..."

traits.locale_text: “幸好我们当场抓住了她。如果那条毒蛇逃掉的话，再过个五年，或者十年，你的家人恐怕又要迎接一场可怕的惊喜了，老家伙……”

languages.text: « Heureusement qu'on l'a prise la main dans le sac... Si ce serpent avait réussi à s'en tirer, j'ose pas imaginer ce que votre famille aurait subi d'ici cinq à dix ans... »
languages.original_text: "It's a good thing we caught her in the act — if the snake had got away, your family could have been in for a nasty surprise in about five or ten years' time, old man..."

traits.locale_text: « Heureusement qu'on l'a prise la main dans le sac... Si ce serpent avait réussi à s'en tirer, j'ose pas imaginer ce que votre famille aurait subi d'ici cinq à dix ans... »

languages.text: «Menos mal que la atrapamos in fraganti. Si esa víbora hubiera escapado, su familia se habría llevado una sorpresa muy desagradable en cinco o diez años, anciano...».
languages.original_text: "It's a good thing we caught her in the act — if the snake had got away, your family could have been in for a nasty surprise in about five or ten years' time, old man..."

traits.locale_text: «Menos mal que la atrapamos in fraganti. Si esa víbora hubiera escapado, su familia se habría llevado una sorpresa muy desagradable en cinco o diez años, anciano...».

languages.text: 「子分を現場で捕らえられてよかったわ…このヘビが逃げていたら、5年後か10年後、あなたの家族はひどい目に遭っていたかもしれないわね、そうでしょ、おじいさん？」
languages.original_text: "It's a good thing we caught her in the act — if the snake had got away, your family could have been in for a nasty surprise in about five or ten years' time, old man..."

traits.locale_text: 「子分を現場で捕らえられてよかったわ…このヘビが逃げていたら、5年後か10年後、あなたの家族はひどい目に遭っていたかもしれないわね、そうでしょ、おじいさん？」

languages.text: "Ein Glück, dass wir sie auf frischer Tat ertappt haben. Wäre die Schlange entkommen, hätte Eure Familie in etwa fünf oder zehn Jahren eine unschöne Überraschung erleben können, alter Mann .."
languages.original_text: "It's a good thing we caught her in the act — if the snake had got away, your family could have been in for a nasty surprise in about five or ten years' time, old man..."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Glück, dass wir sie auf frischer Tat ertappt haben. Wäre die Schlange entkommen, hätte Eure Familie in etwa fünf oder zehn Jahren eine unschöne Überraschung erleben können, alter Mann .."

languages.original_text: "It's a good thing we caught her in the act — if the snake had got away, your family could have been in for a nasty surprise in about five or ten years' time, old man..."

languages.text: "Onu suçüstü yakalamamız iyi oldu. Yılanı elimizden kaçırsaydık beş on yıla ailen çok nahoş bir sürprizle karşılaşacaktı ihtiyar."
languages.original_text: "It's a good thing we caught her in the act — if the snake had got away, your family could have been in for a nasty surprise in about five or ten years' time, old man..."

traits.locale_text: "Onu suçüstü yakalamamız iyi oldu. Yılanı elimizden kaçırsaydık aileni beş on yıl içinde nahoş bir sürpriz bekliyor olurdu ihtiyar."
